name: OnlyOneDay Post Jam Version
description:
I made a couple of changes/bug fixes based on your feedback:

  • Previously played endings will appear instantly, rather than slowly scrolling, making it faster to replay.
  • "Press Enter to start" replaces "Press any key to start"

----Original Description----

You make an unfortunate discovery that the Earth is soon to be destroyed. How will you react? And how will you spend your final day on Earth?

- A short text adventure written for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam. I tried to make a game with graphics but gave up after the first day as I can't draw to save my life, so I opted for making a text adventure, because that's all I know how to do.

Comment what endings you got, I'm just curious...
